name: クリア
message: "By the way, Master, not to change the subject, but are we going to try to get into Oval Tower?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm still not sure exactly what our next step is, but I think we should scope out the tower just in case."

name: クリア
message: "Then why don't we go there? It can't hurt to get the lay of the land."
I nod while plucking a strawberry off a stack of pancakes. That was my plan to begin with.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Alright, let's get ready and head out."

name: クリア
message: "Okay. Oh, don't worry. I'll clean up."
...Our little slapstick routine continues as we clean up breakfast and get ready to leave.
